about.title: Boutique Legal Solutions
about.description: Ward Law is a boutique legal solutions provider specializing in defense law.  We serve clients throughout Washington state.
paragraphs: Greetings from Washington state.  I'm Nick Ward, a Washington defense attorney with 10 years of case law experience.
My clients are my top priority.  They like me because I keep them out of jail.  I like them because they pay my bills.
I'm also handsome, funny, and a great dancer.  Judges love me.  Prosecutors fear me.  I'm the best defense attorney in the state.
